title: Clinical Characteristics and Treatment of Patients Infected with COVID-19 in Shishou, China
abstract: Background: (NCP) Novel coronavirus pneumonia that recently occurred in HubeProvince, China is caused by a new type of coronavirus (new coronavirus in 2019) (AU - Qin, Xiongwei;Qiu, Shaohong;Yuan, Yaoming;Zong, Yan;Tuo, Zhan;Li, Jie;Liu, Jun
